survey_response.review_text: Dr Gupta is gem of a person and a thorough professional. Very humble, his compassion for patient sets him apart from his peers. He has an eye for details and smallest of issues doesn’t go unnoticed. His is very good in understanding patients’ issues and explain the line of treatment to patients. May god bless him

Dr ‘s communication with patient is excellent and I am fully satisfied with the treatment.I am also impressed with his contributions towards Airtel’s Marathon (likely next month)despite his very busy schedule.Besides his views on the philosophy of life are really appreciable.

First of all, I thank to Mr. Sameer Gupta for his kind nature...He helped me in every possible way to overcome my problem and after having result, he himself send me to a good neurologist Mrs. Sonia Gupta who was also so kind to me...Both of them helped me in my treatment n made me feel relax...
Thank you.

He is fantastic doctor, i consulted him during the peak of Covid second wave for some uncomfortable feeling and pain around my chest....he not only made me comfortable but also heard all my concern, gave me full time and assured me that I am perfectly fine! In times when people in Delhi were running from pillar to post for hospital beds Dr. Sameer gave me all the assurance that if I face any emergency, he is just a call away and I can seek his help in calling an abundance and getting a bed if god forbid I had required the same, his comforting words were enough to make me feel better! His international training and exposure is surely making a big difference for we delhites, thank a lot, Dr. Sameer.
Precise assessment and patient listening. Does not rush to conclusions. **** ******** *********. Not dismissive about other opinions.

*** ****** ***** ** *** **** ******* He provided deep insights about my health status and answered all my queries satisfactorily and patiently. He has extremely patient oriented approach and I really want to thanks him for everything- Thanks

Absolutely excellent experience. 
Both Dr Sameer and Dr. Sonia are outstanding. 
They are the best. I recommend them very strongly indeed.

A very good and friendly doctor ..who explains very well ..
Really happy to be treated by him …would like to recommend him to everyone..really satisfied
Good behavior & more satisfaction to tell about treatment good wishes & be healthy wealthy prosperous in future with family.
********* ****** * Fully satisfied. One can make the difference after meeting him between us trained and Indian trained doctors

Total friendly discussion and we'll explained about the Life style. Although it was our first visit but We found him as if a family doctor.🙏
Spends time with you to learn about the problems. Gives you a patient hearing. ********* ********** Felt better and convinced after he explained the issue. Highly recommend him

Dr Sameer was very patient,calm,smiling and soft spoken. Went through each and every report page, we had brought. Our Extended loop recorder or Holter report was alone 27 pages plus ct, angiography,X-ray,echo and blood reports, 3 doctors prescriptions....12 plus medicines (taking twice daily 26 tablets)were changed to just 1 medicine, once daily single dose plus 1 medicine  on SOS basis.All in all, he goes above and beyond the call of duty for his patients. May he ever be blessed...
Dr is friendly with the patient and ask about all the stories about your health and advising each and every steps you have to follow in details

Wonderful Doctor very informative .
Explains details and plans ahead.Not a hurried consult .patiently listens
Very thorough *** ************* ************. Was able to explain my condition to me and help me in making a plan for treatment. Definitely recommend as a physician.

Excellent services by Dr. Sameer Gupta.
MP heart clinic w-33, Basement Greter kailash part-1. New Delhi
Very positive doctor. Very clear explanation of the situation. I do feel very confident with the received advise. Feeling very relaxed with this cardiologist. Very good experience

Very kind and patient  doctor!! :)  would definitely recommend everyone to visit his clinic.
He explained the problem well and I am very satisfied.

The doctor spent ample time studying the reports and gave us clear explanation and sound advice .
Grateful
